name: draco-meteor
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.black-white: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
